Skip - Thought encoder.from sentence: The Skip - Thought encoder for the model encodes sentences with length less than 30 words using 2400 GRU units with word vector dimensionality of 620 to produce 4800 - dimensional combineskip vectors . .

combine - skip vectors.from sentence: The combine - skip vectors , with the first 2400 dimensions being uni-skip model and the last 2400 bi-skip model , are used as they have been found to be the best performing in the experiments
